divs: Sighting DetailsI was over my grandmothers house and I was sitting on the back deck relaxing. It was dark out side but the lights from the city were illuminating the sky some what. I was looking up at the sky and I saw a blinking red dot fly across the sky the craft was a triangle shape. It was a very deafining roar with pulses. The house and the ground started to shake intensly. The car alarm on my H3 went off with out a problem and it takes something for that to go off. Because when I went to the airshow by me and a B-1 flew over and that wasn't nearly not even close to how loud that unidentified aircraft was.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Solon
There were no other sightings in Solon on or around August 29th 2007
Summary: I think this was the Aurora.
